examples.$comment: Rotate the device by 15 degrees counter-clockwise (rotationDegrees: 45).
Rotate the device by 100 degrees clockwise (supportsContinuousRotation: true, rotationDegrees: 270).

rotationDegrees.description: An absolute value, in degrees, that specifies the final clockwise rotation of the device. Value must fall within rotationDegreesRange attribute.

rotationPercent.description: An absolute value, in percentage, that specifies the final rotation of the device.
